mapper.select: SELECT SDATE ,ST_TM ,AREA_NM ,AREA_CD ,RUN_AREA_NM ,RUN_AREA_CD ,RUN_ORDER ,ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR ,PLAT_NUM ,DRIVER_NM ,F_NODE_NM ,T_NODE_NM ,F_NODE_ID ,T_NODE_ID ,MAX_TT ,MAX_USER FROM DRP_ROUTE_SCHE WHERE 1=1 AND SDATE = TO_DATE(#{sDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ST_TM LIKE #{stTm}||'%' AND ROUTE_ID = #{routeId}
